about_the_game:
Seditionis: Crutarch Royale is the second game in the Seditionis Franchise from Dragonflare Studios LLC.

In a brutal and dystopian galaxy far into the future, you are a super marine enhanced with implants and psionics. A galactic rebellion has taken place between Nationalists and Imperials.

As a Crutarch, you are an ascended like super being that fights on behalf of truth or lies. Crutarchs are immortal.

Current game modes in the game include:

1. A conquest mode where 3 points are available for capture. Max players of 32 in 16vs16 team combat.
2. A Team deathmatch and solo deathmatch mode where top team or top player wins the round.
3. A rush mode where the attacking team must bomb multiple objectives while the defending team must defend them and reduce the attacking team's
reinforcements to zero to win.
4. A test vehicle map mode for future release of vehicle combat. The vehicle map is set to rules similar to conquest.
5. Classic capture the flag mode where the team that captures the most flags wins.
6. A kill confirmed mode where you must take the dogtags of dead enemies to collect points and deny the enemy from taking your team's dogtags. Highest score wins.

Players can also play in single player or host their own multiplayer games.

Choose between 4 classes and weapon loadouts including:

1. Assault, medic, support, and scout classes. Each class can hold a differing amount of max ammo depending on their role (ie. Scouts can hold a lot of sniper ammo but not a lot of assault rifle ammo).
2. Different perks that slightly enhance your playstyle (ie. more grenades or drop claymore mines).
3. Choose a different primary weapon. Currently all classes can choose every primary.

This game is in prototype changes and this description will change as game progression occurs. See the early access or forums for more info.

content_descriptors.notes:
Animated violence with guns, rockets, explosions, grenades, and blood splatters on hit. Future content updates may contain profanity, mild sexual suggestive themes, politics, Christianity, anti-Christianity, demons, fear, "fud", political issues, displays of anger, fear, and hatred.

Online gaming experience may change with interaction with other people.
